meaningMnemonic: <kanji>Freeze</kanji> and <kanji>look at</kanji> me. Your <vocabulary>stare</vocabulary> is giving me the creeps! You can move now. Hey. You can move now. Stop I said!
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
